Body: My HTC Wildfire got passcode locked (too many tries), and the Google account isn't working. I need to get some important messages off of it.I don't know much about behind the scenes stuff but I know I'm pretty much hopeless, because the phone isn't rooted and bootloader is locked too, so if using ADB to find the messaging database wont work since its secure. I guess I'm just looking for any last hopes before just factory-reset and forget about the messages. Anyone think they can help?
Title: Locked out of htc wildfire, need to get some messages of the phone, pretty much at the end of the line

history.Text: So yeah This htc wildfire got passcode locked too many times and the google account isnt working who knows why and i need to get some important messages off of it. I don't know much about behind the scenes stuff but I know I'm pretty much hopeless because the phone isn't rooted and bootloader is locked too so if using adb to find the messaging database wont work since its secure. I guess I'm just looking for any last hopes before just factory resetting and forgetting about the messages. Anyone think they can help? Thanks in advance.
